title: (Fri Early Bird) Lunchbox Tries to Get Out of Taking to Use Chris Janson’s Gift Card + Mailbag: Listener Found Earring in Fiancé’s Apartment + Easy Trivia and Fun Fact Friday!
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Lunchbox Tries to Get Out of Taking to Use Chris Janson’s Gift Card + Mailbag: Listener Found Earring in Fiancé’s Apartment + Easy Trivia and Fun Fact Friday!
description:
Lunchbox still hasn’t used his gift card given to him by Chris Janson. He called the restaurant to get out of taking his kids. A listener is asking for advice because she found an old earring in her fiancés apartment and wants to know if she should be suspicious. We play a round of Easy Trivia and Amy shares her 5 fun facts of the week.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
